languages.text: Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} chance against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}. +1 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for every {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or parried attack.

traits.locale_text: Base armour property: +10% parry chance against melee attacks. +1 temporary wound for every dodged or parried attack.

traits.locale_text: Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +10 % de chances de réussir une {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g}. +1 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessure temporaire{/g} par attaque esquivée ou parée.

languages.text: 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：对抗{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。 每当{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或招架攻击时，都会获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
